content: snowfall cable socks by gardenflower snowfall these socks are rustic warm thick socks they do not have a close fit but are excellent to wear as a second layer in winter as a second layer over your normal cotton socks in your boots when it gets really cold or indoors as warm cozy socks this pattern is worked from the cuff down it has a square heel and a standard classic toe sizes womens medium/large yarn sample shown regia uni solid 6 ply needles 1 set us #2 5/3 mm double pointed needles or circular needles or other size to get gauge notions tapestry needle cable needle in the right size needed to work with the yarn 1 gauge the gauge is really not very important knitting these socks because they have a loose fit but approx 24 stitches/4 inches 10 cm in plain stockinette stitch you can regulate the size a little by yarn choice sport/dk abbreviations k knit m1r make one right with the left needle tip lift strand between needles from back to front on the left needle and knit with your right needle the lifted loop through the front p purl p2tog purl two stitches together r row/row rs right side sl1 k1 psso slip one stitch knit one stitch pass the slipped stitch over the knitted stitch sts stitches ws wrong side cross 3 r cross 3 stitches to the right to work a cable slip 3 stitches p-wise onto a cable needle let cable needle hang in back of work as you knit the next 3 stitches then knit stitches off of cable needle cuff cast on 60 stitches with your favorite cast on method for socks i use the german twisted cast on which gives a very stretchy cast on perfect for socks i knit with a set of 5 double pointed needles and distribute the stitches evenly over four needles before joining the stitches in the round make sure they are not twisted the first needle joining the round is called needle 1 the last needle 4 knit 19 rounds of 2x2 rib k 2 p 2 or as long as you wish your cuff to be on the 20th/last round of the rib increase 4 stitches evenly across the row so you m1r on each needle i m1r at the end of the row you now have 64 sts total distribute 16 sts on each needle the leg start the cable pattern in the first row of the leg k3 p2 k6 p2 k6 p2 k6 p2 k6 p2 k6 p2 k6 p2 k6 p2 k3 knit the next 4 row as the stitches show as first row of leg in cable pattern 5 th row of the leg *cross 3r the last 3 sts of needle 4 with the first 3 sts of needle 1 p2
